net.sf.wubiq.print.managers

Interface IDirectConnectorQueue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdapter, IProxyAdapter

    public interface IDirectConnectorQueue
extends IAdapter
    Represents the contract for direct connectors.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

void addPrintJob(long jobId,
                             IRemotePrintJob remotePrintJob)
        Deprecated. 
        Adds a print job to the manager.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        remotePrintJob - Remote print job.

      • addPrintJob

        long addPrintJob(IRemotePrintJob remotePrintJob)
        Adds a new print job to the queue.
        Parameters:
        remotePrintJob - Print job to be added to the queue.
        Returns:
        Id of the print job added.

      • removePrintJob

        boolean removePrintJob(long jobId)
        Removes the print job from the queue.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        Returns:
        True if removed properly.

      • remotePrintJob

        IRemotePrintJob remotePrintJob(long jobId)
        Deprecated. Use remotePrintJob(long jobId, boolean full) Returns the associated remote print job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        Returns:
        Found remote print job or null.

      • remotePrintJob

        IRemotePrintJob remotePrintJob(long jobId,
                               boolean full)
        Returns the associated remote print job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        full - If true reads all pertinent data of the print job.
        Returns:
        Found remote print job or null.

      • printJobs

        List of pending print jobs.
        Returns:
        Collection of print jobs.

        Starts the print job.
        Parameters:
        jobId -

      • sendCommand

        void sendCommand(RemoteCommand remoteCommand)
        Sends a command to the remote printer.
        Parameters:
        remoteCommand - Command to send. Must never be null.

      • queueReturnedData

        void queueReturnedData(ReturnedData data)
        Queues the returned data on this printer.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to be queued

      • isCommandToSendReady

        boolean isCommandToSendReady()
        Checks if there is a command ready to be sent.
        Returns:
        True if there is a command ready to sent, false otherwise.

      • getCommandToSend

        RemoteCommand getCommandToSend()
        Gets the command to send to the physical fiscal printer.
        Returns:
        Data or null if nothing is pending.

      • resetCommandToSend

        void resetCommandToSend()
        Resets the command to send.

      • returnData

        java.lang.Object returnData()
        Waits for the response to become available, and returns it to the caller.
        Returns:
        Returned data.

      • callCommand

        java.lang.Object callCommand(java.lang.Long jobId,
                             RemoteCommand remoteCommand,
                             boolean clientSupportsCompression)
        Execute a method on the object referenced within the remote command.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        remoteCommand - Remote command to be processed.
        clientSupportsCompression - If true the client supports compression.
        Returns:
        Object resulting from the process execution.

      • registerObject

        java.lang.Object registerObject(java.lang.Long jobId,
                                java.util.UUID objectUUID,
                                java.lang.Object object)
        Registers a given object according to its object type.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        objectUUID - Type of object to be registered.
        object - Object to be registered.
        Returns:
        Previously registered object or null.

      • getRemoteData

        java.lang.String getRemoteData(java.lang.Long jobId,
                               java.lang.String dataUUID)
        Called from server to get the data saved by a previous command.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        dataUUID - identifier of the data to be retrieve.
        Returns:
        String containing data or exception. The null value is represented by an special string.

      • removeRemoteData

        void removeRemoteData(java.lang.Long jobId,
                      java.lang.String dataUUID)
        Removes the remote data.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        dataUUID - identifier of the data to be retrieve.

      • getAdapter

        java.lang.Object getAdapter(java.lang.Long jobId,
                            java.util.UUID objectUUID)
        Gets the adapter.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Id of the job being processed.
        objectUUID - Id of the adapter
        Returns:
        Adapter object.

      • pendingPrintJobs

        int pendingPrintJobs(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Calculates the count of pending jobs for the given print service.
        Parameters:
        printService - Associated print service.
        Returns:
        The count of pending jobs.

      • calculatePrintJobs

        int calculatePrintJobs(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                       RemotePrintJobStatus status)
        Calculates the total print jobs.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to calculate the total print jobs.
        status - Status of the requested print job. If null ALL print jobs should be counted.
        Returns:
        Total number of print jobs found or null.

      • hasLocalPrintJob

        boolean hasLocalPrintJob(java.lang.Long jobId)
        Checks if the connector has a local (in memory) copy of the print job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job Id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the connector has a local copy.
